amendment.description: To provide funding for the Dropout Prevention Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1624 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1624 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 1594. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11321) To provide funding for the Dropout Prevention Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1624 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1624 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 1594.
